projects.title: Compass Form
projects.subtitle: This front-end project marks my first major development endeavor of 2023, created during my internship at Compass UOL. It showcases a multi-step form interface, thoughtfully designed to guide users through a seamless input experience.
keys: Modular Architecture: Built with clean, maintainable HTML and CSS modules.
Dynamic Interactivity: JavaScript powers the form logic, enabling smooth navigation between pages.
Persistent Data Storage: User responses are securely stored using the browser’s Local Storage, ensuring data remains intact across sessions.
